title: So I Dragon's descent or Kha'Zix leap for a free ulti from Yasuo?
body:
Is this intended?

It's pretty annoying since these are the only 2 Champions that suffer from this. (Haven't tested Zac though and can't think of/don't remember seeing it with any others but I am 100% sure it happens with Shyvana and I believe it happens with Kha'Zix's E too; pretty sure it happened to me before and pretty sure I saw it happen to Nightblue3 a while ago).

Like I ulti away as Shyvana and he gets to ulti me... pretty sad.

Seems pretty cheap.

It's like my only Gap Closer and it gives him a free gap closer and ulti on me. I don't understand aye.

I hope this was intended because I'd be really annoyed if it was just coding and overlooked. Sometimes people assume...

replies.body: It should not happen with anyone you leap with, only knock ups caused by Yasuo's teammates
I notified help and Support and a Rioter said it's not meant to happen so is notifying the developers.
If you could video this it would be great. AFAIK, the ult has specifically been designed to not include self-knockups.

It says that on Lolwiki but I am 100% sure it happens with Shyvana when she ultis and think it happens with others too.

I don't have Fraps on this computer.

Yeah think it happens with Trist too.

It says on Lolwiki it doesn't and on this post in 2013; the Yasuo AMA: http://www.surrenderat20.net/2013/12/yasuo-ama-summary.html

They state:

Q. Can Yasuo ult an enemy Ziggs when he goes airborne with W?
"Nope. There were iterations of Yasuo's ult that worked on any jump as well as knock up and they were incredibly frustrating to say the least :p. Tristana especially got screwed because she has such a long cast time on Rocket Jump." - SmashGizmo

Q. Will Yasuo's ult work on targets that are leaping or targets knocked up by neutral monsters?
"Last Breath, Yasuo’s R, can be cast on any knockup or knockback applied by Yasuo himself or one of his teammates. The ability is about coordination and synergy, so it didn’t make sense to include enemy leaps (such as Tristana’s Rocket Jump) or neutral monster knock ups (such as those cast by Baron/Vilemaw). 
We actually playtested a version where Yasuo could grab enemy champions who leapt out of the air with his ult. It seemed cool on paper. In practice, I, who was playing Yasuo, spent the entire post-6 laning phase mashing the R button while RiotFan, sitting next to me playing Jax, refused to ever once use his Leap Strike. Jerk." - CertainlyT

They might have changed it in the patch notes but I don't remember but they also could have reverted it unintentionally:

A micro change (where simply changing a 1 to a 0 on "allow x-lastbreath-x on y" if "self-cast" might escape a patch or someone going over the code might copy a template for updating a new Champs knockups or something and update the profile of knockups to "1" across" "all x knockups" and not know they are updating "x knockups" for self inflicted to "1" instead of "0" or something instead of just "x knockups" for "ally and own Champion inflicted" or might have taken "self" inflicted as inflicted by the Champion being coded and not "self champion" or some form of coding error like that...

They've admitted time and again the spaghetti code in this game. They can change something completely unrelated and shit like this happens. Just post in on the report a bug board page and they'll fix it.
